title: blue essence gone
body: i just finished the quest where u get 9000 blue essence and then sudenly they are gone for some stupid reason. Whats going on??

replies.body: before my game i had about 6190 BE or very close to that number, got out of the game, and now i have exactly 5280 BE, i bought nothing, i was saving for a champion for a week now and it makes me mad, i will quit playing league forever if it does not get fixed
Guys my blue essence is gone please do somethin help :(
